review: Honestly the, as for mobile, is good both in terms of gameplay and mechanics ( though on some champions like fiora it is nearly impossible to properly control ur Q in a team fight as with a short tap it goes full length). However, the biggest problem is matchmaking. As there is not dedicated role system like in PC version, more often then not players play the lane that they had initially in mind. This results in often having games without anyone going jg, top, mid, or bot (had games where there were 3 people per lane). This makes it not fun to plane and I would rather wait for it to be fixed than play it again.

I‚Äôm back in League of Legends! I used to play the original PC version for almost a decade! I quit the PC version and haven‚Äôt played the original for 3 years!! 

I‚Äôm glad Riot Games finally brought League to mobile and consoles! I‚Äôll play it on my Switch too once that version comes out with cross-save and play! 

The faster matches, new character models, and new game engine makes this League, a much newer and welcoming to new and veteran summoners alike! I love the new Champion models and animations, it makes them more alive than the original PC version! 

I can tell this was based on Arena of Valor game engine, but updated and modified with the League of Legends theme.

I recommend Wild Rift for those who like characters and faster paced matches on the go! And don‚Äôt like the original League of Legends on PC anymore, since the original version have matches that take too long and an already aging game engine, even though for nostalgia.
review_title: About time! League on the go and for consoles!

review:
Love this game so much. Somehow, I would be pleased if we could report bugs and problems in-game as I have a few problems and don‚Äôt know where to report them. For the current event, protectors of Ionia, I didn't get any points even though I‚Äôve played several rank games (I should get 3 points per rank). I need it to exchange for rewards so please fix this for me. 

Furthermore, about the AFK matters, I would be appreciated it if we could earn extra protection when our teammates are AFK. I have played lots of games with AFK teammates since the beginning of the match and lost. 

This game is so enjoyable and I love playing it so much, so, please put a bug report function in-game so that players could reach out and get their problems fixed faster. Once again, please fix the Protectors of Ionia Event for me and give me points as soon as possible. 

I‚Äôm looking forward to hearing from you.

I was dang tired of playing that rip off bangblah or heroes ew. I was nothing but ecstatic to hear The Godfather Riot would be claiming the genre on mobile that they claim on pc and I was not surprised when I was surprised that they outdone them self‚Äôs again. The switch over from PC to mobile while still increasing game state and reworking items with working champions from the current champion pool , I mean I just love the entire game coming from league of legends on PC I‚Äôm happy you decided to make the game, and congratulations to Sett the newest champion released to the rift

This is the best gamer ever and I have some feedback I think it would be cool for the wild rift community to choose what champion comes out next so yeah that‚Äôs basically my Feedback yeah not feedback as well have an opinion but I‚Äôm not sure if you‚Äôve done this yet but if you have well guess I‚Äôm late to the party because I‚Äôm not sure if I start playing then I‚Äôm not sure but other than that that‚Äôs all I have to say and this is a great game and I can‚Äôt wait to with this game has stored in for the future and I love this game

review: I like this game really but it only has this major problem: 90% of the time you have an afk player on your team which means losing the game 99% of the time. What's more frustrating is that all the players suffer rank points because of the irresponsible person. I think the game's compensation method is useless; why do I care if there player is banned? Will it return my rank points? No! You will just get stuck in a tier forever until you've had enough and uninstall the game. I think a better solution is not deducing rank points from the losing team since no one had to be published for the fault of someone whine they don't even know! It's just ridiculously brutal. If give it 5 stars if they fix the penalty and the matchmaking issues.

review: I do not know what could possibly be going through you people‚Äôs head, but if I am running Xfinity from Comcast in the Southeastern United States with a $200 router and a 400 MBps download speed package, the least I could possibly expect is to not have horrific latency issues. I will go from a playable 35 ms to 255 ms (practically impossible to play at higher ranks) randomly throughout the game, and it absolutely ruins the experience for me every single time. Learn how to make a game properly and invest in the right servers that cover the right regions, or do not make the game at all. Utterly ridiculous that this is even a possible issue in 2021. You all have a great idea here, but the execution has simply fallen short. I am 2 feet away from my router and still have these issues. Do better.

review: I rarely play mobile games so I can‚Äôt compare it to other moba. But first of all, playing just 1 or 2 games gives me sore hands. There‚Äôre experienced players and some who are new and have no idea what they‚Äôre doing, i find it harder to communicate on phone so if you have more new players on your team you have no chance to turn the game around. I left one game cuz it was just waste of time and got banned already. I‚Äôm not saying that it‚Äôs right to leave games, but seriously no one got time for playing a game with 0 chance of turning around. I feel like we should have a surrender option early in game.
review_title: I will just stick with pc version

review: I loved League but some matches legitimately went on for more than an hour. Wild Rift bumps up the game‚Äôs speed, making a quicker round of League. This fixes a lot of my gripes with the original LoL. Some other differences such as items and ability tweaks makes for a similar experience with a bit less of a learning curve. With Wild Rift, teaching friends how to play it is way simpler than with PC LoL. That in itself is reason for a 5 star from me. While dumbing down the game may be a turn off for some, making it more accessible at least creates an entry for newer players to get a good taste.

All around a really good game. A couple of gripes keep it from being 5 stars:
-The estimated time for matchmaking is terrible. Will show 18 seconds and then you wait for 4 mins. And then the game punishes you if you have to step away for a second. 

-Biggest issue is leavers in ranked. I‚Äôd say there‚Äôs someone who disconnects in the first couple of minutes into a ranked match a third of the time, and the team still loses rank.  Need to figure out a more fair way of dealing with this or I doubt I‚Äôll stay invested in the game.
review_title: Very solid mobile MOBA but they have a couple things they need to figure out

review: The application is well done and fun to play. Unfortunately, the rating system is focused on making everyone feel good and not on providing a decent player experience. As you rise in rank you will find your games filled with trolls and truly bad players. The rating system rewards participation but does not penalize poor performance. So terrible players get promoted and the system is set up to make sure everyone has a 50% win rate. (It‚Äôs the Peter principle on steroids.) Once you get halfway decent the system pairs you with bad players and the player experience becomes horrible. It‚Äôs too bad they don‚Äôt provide an advanced AI setting. it would be less frustrating that way.
review_title: Ap Great, Rating System Is A Disaster

review: I have played league of legends for like 5 years. This game addresses so much that‚Äôs wrong with the original. It‚Äôs not exactly ‚Äúbetter league‚Äù because it‚Äôs certainly a mobile game with enough differences that skills don‚Äôt transfer really outside of some basic game knowledge, but I‚Äôm a multi-platform gamer and I don‚Äôt mind using mobile controls. The auto attacking could maybe be a little smoother, but there‚Äôs so many other things that are improved. I‚Äôm having a great time. Thanks guys.

Those who‚Äôve played league on pc and are discouraged about having to start earning those champs again don‚Äôt worry! Playing for a couple hours and getting those rewards from the events alone has earned me 25 champs in just one day (some of them you even get to pick which one you want to keep). I thought wild rift would just be like one of those free moba games that are grindy when it comes to earning champions without paying micro transactions but I‚Äôm glad I was proven wrong.
review_title: Most generous free mobile game I‚Äôve ever played

review:
The game mechanics work great. The targeting is awesome and the skills seem somewhat balanced even though there are definitely champs who are OP currently. 

The real issue I‚Äôve been having is connection issues. After this last patch I‚Äôve not been able to connect to about 70% of the matches that I‚Äôve agreed to play. Specifically ranked games. It will go through the champ select process and then at the champion portrait screen I am prompted with a menu that says I am having trouble connecting. When I try connecting again, nothing. When I click cancel it logs me out. When I log back in I am still unable to connect to the game.

This seasons Ranked matchmaking system is literally broken and horrible. I used to play this game constantly with friends everyday but have limited my playing time due to the match making system. You‚Äôre either winning really well or losing really hard in each match. When you‚Äôre having a good win % the match making system will purposefully make you team up with bad players who are feeding or trolls that will make you have a losing streak. This system will constantly make you have around 50% rank win rate. Why punish good players and make the bad players blossom? This game is slowly losing its fan base due to this season rank system. Even you-tubers such as darkbreaker has talked about this season ranked matchmaking phenomenon.

1. Language barrier You would think being in the NA server you would get a bunch of english speaking players‚Äîno! All my ranked matches have been nothing but a major Spanish class where there is no form of communication. Sure there‚Äôs pings, but, it is being utilized as a trolling-spamming button. I had fun playing (barely) however i am here to tell you that it useless playing a game that requires communication when the company doesn‚Äôt do anything about the server issue. It makes for a difficult game to climb ranks and non-joyful experience. Fix it! You‚Äôre better off playing Mobile Legends at this point, at least you get more players from your actual server.
developerResponse: {'id': 25156874, 'body': "Hi there Loserkd,\n\nThat sounds like something we might be able to help you with! Send us a ticket at https://support-wildrift.riotgames.com/ and we'll try to get you back on track.", 'modified': '2021-09-17T07:16:33Z'}

review:
I‚Äôd say the majority of this games reviews are fake. Player base is toxic in this game, most the time teammates will intentionally feed running down mid, or AFK and you‚Äôre stuck in a 4v5 situation. It honesty happened to me in 4-5 games in a row even. That‚Äôs wasting over an hour of time being stuck in games that are just unfun and unplayable because your teammates will always refuse to surrender. 

The worst part is there is no punishment for trolling people and constantly ruining games so these players will never be banned, meaning the games only going to get worse. I don‚Äôt know why this game has a 4 star, it looks like a bunch of bots wrote the 5 star reviews though so I‚Äôd say most reviews are fake. 

I love League of Legends but the mobile version is pretty unbalanced and unplayable.

It‚Äôs a great game remember it‚Äôs not league of legends on iPhone! It takes key elements from the PC version and improves on a lot of things. It‚Äôs like it‚Äôs own version of mobile league of legends. It‚Äôs the best MOBA on the App Store you will find so I love it. I have played league of legends on PC for 7 years. It‚Äôs nice to play something a little different than the PC version. My only Gripe is that you can‚Äôt decline a match once you search for a match there is no backing out. And you get penilzed if you don‚Äôt accept it. Please add a decline match and no penalties for that.

Got it yesterday and I‚Äôm kinda obsessed with it. I like everything except the warnings. So far I was warned for leaving a match, and failing to join a match. How is it exactly my fault when I‚Äôm unable to play? I‚Äôm punished for leaving when I have no choice but to leave. I don‚Äôt like these warnings. It‚Äôs unfair for people who need to quit to prioritize real life things. I closed the game in order to go inside a store that I had no choice but to go, and when I opened the app, I had the warning. It makes no sense to have it. I understand it hurts the ability for our teammates to win, but it‚Äôs also unfair to punish someone for what they cannot control.

I play league on pc (and I‚Äôm a bit jealous of how good the game and skins look), however I was pleasantly surprised at how well it played. I understand it is a mobile game so it has to be dumbed down, however there is one key aspect i really miss. I don‚Äôt really enjoy the controller esque controls. I used to play Vainglory back when it was big and it was the game that got me into mobas, therefore I love their controls. These controls also got me acquainted to mobas as a genre and helped me understand league fairly well. Please consider making point and click controls!

The game is wildly fast paced, and incredibly rewarding if you can keep up. The problem stems from the learning curve. The basic introduction is great to get people good at hitting creeps and taking towers, but beyond that? Good Luck‚Ä¶ I come from the PC version, playing since beta, and people still don‚Äôt take the lantern.

It‚Äôs okay, people are human. Just be ready to lose as much as you win, 50% win rate is actually a good thing, anything higher than that and you‚Äôre going to climb ranked over 100‚Äôs of games. Don‚Äôt tilt, and if you do, take a walk or play some aram hahaha.

GLHF summoners.

This game is failing in North America so they are banning accounts randomly and for unequal reasons ( I had several accounts so I know). They are banning so those players make more accounts and buy more skins so they can maintain profit. The matchmaking is so bad that it supports trolling and the moderators do a horrible job of being consistent on their decision making process as well as slow communication times. They will respond a week or more after a ticket without even answering the main question asked and usually just to say that they won‚Äôt do anything about your problem. I‚Äôm done with league and no one should be supporting a company like this that is doing such a biased and poor job at management.
review_title: Moderators and matchmaking are the problem - uninstall

review:
I love this game! The champions are amazing and the game is so fun. But there are some problems. The first one being that if you leave a match, they give you a warning. But if you do it again you are suspended from the game. This is an issue because if your device runs out of power you can‚Äôt control that. Or if your parents tell you to do homework or chores you have to leave. Another one is that the champions cost a lot. I feel like that could change.
All in all this is a pretty cool game and I seriously recommend it.
review_title: Very good! But there are a few problems . . .

review: I truly belive this is the first mobile port that lives up to the original.  The controls are easy to understand, there's a giant spectrum of characters ranging from a rock to a purple troll, and each champion is unique. Also, visually this game is fantastic. The devs put so much thought into each skin, champion, the rift and howling abyss, so that the whole lol world feels so alive. There are a few problems like the infamous matchmaking, but  everything else makes the problem minor. Also, the ingame events are a lot of fun. Truly, this game is amazing

I play this game daily and I‚Äôve been a fan of league of legends on desktop for years. The mobile game is impressive and exceeded my initial expectations, but it would be nice if the wild pass were attainable by saving up a bunch of blue essence or poro coins, or some other currency that can be acquired through the completion of missions and tasks. Not asking for it to be easily attainable but maybe it can be a reward for heavily active players and people who can save toward a big purchase. Not everyone can afford to pay every few weeks on a mobile game.
review_title: Great game but wild pass should be free

review: The Games really nice like I love it I‚Äôm getting a team together via discord and everything but there seems to be a problem when I try to purchase wildcores my first payment of 10$ went through but then when I tried to make a second purchase of 5$ it wouldn‚Äôt let me so I figured my first purchase must‚Äôve decline but it was pending but it came out of pending on App Store and went successfully so I tried again cuz I really wanted omega squad teemo and I‚Äôm trying to save my wild cores to get him it‚Äôs just taking forever for my purchase devs help me please

Everything else is good but I will never play this game again until the official report of one racist. WeedVz called me Covid because I use Chinese to communicate with my other teammates. I reported this guy right after the end of game. But there is no response from that. The racist have played 2 more games and may continue  playing games without any warning. I got mad not because of he is a racist but why there is no punishment for racist? Developer please, Everyone is Equal No Matter Races or Gender is not just a slogan. Please do something to get the world become better.

I‚Äôll be honest, this is my first moba. But it has sucked me in and is a dream to play. It‚Äôs fairly easy to learn (as far as mobas go), has a decent player base that is steadily growing, and is constantly being updated with new characters and skins.  It has a fully customizable in-game UI, so you can setup the controls the way you find most comfortable for your hands.  There is a decent amount of information online if you desire to get better. This is an excellent game and I am excited for that RIOT has in store.

I hate when somebody leaves the match it makes it so you can‚Äôt reconnect and you have to close out of the app if you reconnect it makes you sit and says match is unavailable. Really dislike all the Dodgers feel like if you started a game and somebody quits it doesn‚Äôt  mean you have to wait five minutes to go for another game with somebody else to just quits and start the timer all over again. just for them to freeze the game for you again.

The moba game is fun but everyone is dealing with high ping spike issues because WiFi networks don‚Äôt prioritize phones with internet connection. review: This game is super fun, been playing for close to a year now. Matches have been consistent with players not backing out right at the start, but there seems to be an issue with matchmaking. Majority of ranked and unranked matches I play I end up with teammates stealing roles, brand new to the game, or just really bad teammates and the opposing team is consistently platinum or higher and great with roles and teamwork. Unless you have a consistent group to play with, don‚Äôt bother with ranked. It‚Äôs nice in the early levels, but if you solo queue higher up, get ready for consistent frustrating losses due to team balancing.
review_title: Fun game as long as teams are balanced and people actually play

review:
Picked one star just so this could be read haha

I think it would be better to add a notification option where if a friend goes online or sends a message the phone would receive notifications. this is because it is rather hard to play with friends all over the globe due to time differences, it happens very often that I meet someone whom I play well with for a few rounds and we never come online at the same time again and most of the times I could be playing but I wasn‚Äôt and if there was a notification pop up I would go online. It is also more convenient to communicate this way as we won‚Äôt want to share our real life contact information over the internet

I played the PC version a lot back in the day, paid out tons for champions and skins, and the packages that were offered. I‚Äôm super bummed that none of that transfers over to the mobile version. It‚Äôd be great if the skins and champions unlocked through your PC account could still be accessed through the mobile version. I mean, if you paid, you paid. Bummer that you have to pay twice for the same thing, and a lot of the skins are nonexistent on the mobile version.

I do miss me some Sion and Warwick too. You already have a suppression champion on here now, Warwick wouldn‚Äôt be that difficult to release.

The game plays like butter and games are at most 25 minutes long. Average summoner‚Äôs rift time is usually 15-20 minutes which is perfect for me since I no longer have the time to commit 45 minutes to a game. 

The new player experience is also 10x better than PC. Tons of free champions, daily missions feel good to complete, but not predatory in that it doesn‚Äôt force you to log in every day. The client is also orders of magnitude better than league PC. 

Once this game gets role queue, I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôll need league PC anymore.
review_title: Perfect for people who don‚Äôt have time for PC

review: Riot‚Äôs customer support has consistently disappointed me through the years. Every email I send, every ticket I submit only ever gets a reply from a bot. None of my questions every get answered. Just recently, I was hit with chargeback and had to pay back $9.99 (which I did via PayPal) and even still my account is still locked. I sent multiple emails and tickets (with proof showing I had paid) asking for the status of my account and only received bot replies. Even on the support page the tickets always say ‚Äúsolved‚Äù when Riot has not even reviewed your case. Unprofessional and disappointing. Been playing Riot based games for years and this is how they treat their fans. This might be the final straw.

review:
I have played many seasons of Arena of Valor, I also gave a try to Mobile Legends. Out of those, Wildrift is the better one. I also think that it feels pretty close to the desktop version although I think they shouldn‚Äôt be compared. 

I haven‚Äôt experienced any technical issues and I have been playing since it launched. There will always be some balancing to do but that‚Äôs to be expected from any moba. It‚Äôs hard to rank up in s√≥lo Q but that‚Äôs part of not having friends to play with xD

This game is a lot of fun, it‚Äôs convenient play on a mobile device. Really astounding the games that we can play on our phones now. The wait times for matches are really short. You‚Äôre starting characters are great in my opinion. There are a few characters that are way OP and I don‚Äôt understand how some players are able to play that well with them. Pretty broken but oh well. I also get matched up with people really far from my rank either on my team or the enemy‚Äôs team. Makes it difficult progress and gauge my progress.

I was skeptical that this wouldn‚Äôt be that great and that it would leave out too many key features of the game along with champ design and items and stuff. But to my surprise, they kept a large portion of the crucial features from the PC game. All of the champs have all of the same abilities, and play almost identically. Also the 3D modeling is actually better in thus game than in the PC. Not kidding, but many of the champs and skins look so much better here than anywhere else. Very well done and this is a great next-gen mobile game.

Hello so I have been playing league of legends for 4 years and non of the champions I play are here but as the game is it is the best MOBA on the phone. I just wish for a casual game there would be draft mode next just so everyone can get the concept of picking and roles would be more pronounced on the newer people. The game looks amazing the game feels very fluent and Im having so much fun thank you riot for putting so much effort into this I really enjoy this game I hope everyone does too.
review_title: Great game needs a little tweaking but its so much fun

review:
After the recent update of v2.4, my application has been crashing mid game. The sound is bugged and is causing the crash, I believe. I attempt to correct the incorrect sound by using voice to chat in chat. Sometimes this corrects the sound and it plays normal, other times it causes the app to crash. This only started happening after the update. I don‚Äôt believe it is my phone. 
This minor bug causes major disappointment because it happens mid game and can cause issues. 

Other than that I enjoy this game on mobile very much. It is a more accessible and comfortable way to play league.

I love LoL on desktop and it‚Äôs great to see it come to mobile!  From the very first moments of the tutorial I knew this was something special.  It‚Äôs a great game!  The only problem is I‚Äôve been locked out, even from the single player mode, because I am having trouble downloading patches.  I think the domain may be blocked on the network I‚Äôm on (long story).  I would ask that the devs make it so I can play single player mode without an internet connection and/or without having to update to the latest version.  Thank you!

I had to leave a match because I had to go do something so I exited the app suddenly when I come back in I am banned from going in any matches for eight minutes. I‚Äôm not going to dedicate all of my time to this game, I think it is very unacceptable that someone would get banned for leaving a match just because it‚Äôs not convenient for the other players. I‚Äôm sorry but this game rule that is set up to band players for matches is very unacceptable I would not recommend this game to anyone just because of that. People shouldn‚Äôt have to dedicate all their time to a game so they don‚Äôt get banned for being AFK

I was really expecting this game to feel like a crappy port of PC league, or a reskinned Mobile Legends... but for once Riot truly surpassed my expectations.

The touchscreen controls, gameplay, and pace of the game are incredibly well-tuned. They also play slightly differently than both PC League and Mobile legends.

Champions in WR are FAR more balanced than those in Mobile Legends... with less pay-to-win tactics. And compared to PC League, Riot did away with a ton of small elements that you normally need to worry about on PC to make the game more commuter-friendly.

You‚Äôll notice this in game-time. Monster camps and minions spawn slightly faster. There are no inhibitors (inhibitor turrets instead, like Mobile Legends). And the progression from early, mid, and late game is much much faster.

All around, a great game that performs super well. I‚Äôm genuinely impressed. 

I‚Äôm playing on iPhone 11 btw.

I personally think this game doesn‚Äôt have a significant problem. However, I need to know does reporting a player useful or not. I am still a newbie in this game and I have play my first 5 rank game. Except for the first game, the rest of the rank games was a disaster. I don‚Äôt know are they an actor or not but there are players that will just straight go to the tower and gives the enemy the first blood and take away your land and continues to feed all over the land. Ex. I chose mid land, he take away my mid land and after he gives the opponent 5-6 kill he will move on to the next lane and continue to feed. This is really ridiculous, having team like this for one game it‚Äôs already giving me a headache but for time in a row it‚Äôs just sad.

review: When I am about to enter the ranked match or any match for that matter, it sometimes says fail to connect to match. I try over and over again to join again and it won‚Äôt let me. Fyi I got banned from entering any matches once for about 3 hours. Don‚Äôt get me wrong love the game but still I shouldn‚Äôt be getting penalized for something that is not even my fault.

This game has so much potential, the gameplay is clean, smooth, and fun. The main issue is riots lack of a region/country lock. I cannot tell you how many times I‚Äôve lost games simply due to players from other countries lagging out time and time again, not being able to communicate, etc. it‚Äôs not even their fault, it‚Äôs riots. You cannot expect the game to grow without simple additions like regions. Nothing in this game is more frustrating than your teammates lagging out over and over and worst of all getting the same laggy teammates several games in a row, or even the next day(same goes for throwers or rude players). The game itself is 5 stars, but the experience is nothing higher than a 1.
review_title: So much potential but lacks care

review: I travel a lot for work and can‚Äôt always bring my PC with me, Wild Rift has been good for filling in when I want to play league but don‚Äôt have access to a PC. It‚Äôs nowhere close to a replacement and on its own the game doesn‚Äôt hold a candle to the original, but it‚Äôs a good stand in when you can‚Äôt play on PC. review: I‚Äôm a big fan of lol and I‚Äôm just as excited as everyone else to play lol on mobile. The game overall is great but still needs more improvements in some aspects of the game. But the connection issues have been a major problem lately as it was 30 pins seconds prior to 999 for few seconds which it ruined my whole team fight. The connection issues happen almost every single game and it‚Äôs very frustrating. I do believe riot have been working on many issues of this newly developed game but the connection issues have to be fixed first before anything else.

I like the game a lot and I play often but I do not know for how much longer. Too often you have afk players and then you lose the game. That would not be bad if there was an afk forgiveness for your rank. Other similar games have this feature where if you have an afk teammate then the game won‚Äôt effect your ranking. But this game for some weird reason the developers do not have this. The game will even tell you this person is being punished for AFK so it knows, but it also punishes the AFKers teammates with a lost game strike. It really is asinine that they cannot get this feature added
review_title: Good game but could be so much better

review: I‚Äôve been playing league of legends on PC on and off since 2013. It‚Äôs perhaps my most played game and now since I don‚Äôt game as much I started with mobile, more specifically my iPad. The queues are terribly long if you‚Äôre playing with friends no matter if it‚Äôs aram or normals pvp. I believe it‚Äôs an issue on riots side. So I hope they do fix it. Another loss in star is due to the limited champions (which I understand) but the lack of items is the bigger issue. There‚Äôs like 40 items and jungle role doesn‚Äôt have any jungle items. I hope they fix it and I‚Äôll gladly increase the star! But it is pretty fun not going to lie.

Quick to learn, easy to play.
Riot has outdone themselves moving league to a mobile version keeping everything you loved about the game while removing the everything that was a pain.
for example- playing a 45-60 minute game at a desk at home to have some individual around the world blame the sole reason he is losing the game on his team being garbage and he is a pro.
If you like quick queues, lobby‚Äôs and average 15 minute game times you can play from anywhere then I‚Äôm looking forward to seeing you in the game.

Riot is without a doubt the best game development company on Earth. Simply because League of Legends. This game has is a living, breathing thing. You can get lost in the lore eternally, I mean have you seen Arcane? I have no idea what comments talking about P2W are, League never has been and in fact cannot be P2W. The only thing you can do is look and emote cooler with money. You‚Äôre either good or you‚Äôre not. You either train or you don‚Äôt. Do you have what it takes to climb the ladders and survive the Rift?

review:
As a PC LoL boi, I can say this game is good for mobile league. Though, I will say, and keep saying that PC is better. All of what makes this mobile league is there, and I recommend it.

Now, I need to address the battery usage. After only 2 games it drained 35% battery on a new IPhone 12. You gotta fix that.

Next, the controls are very bad. It‚Äôs good enough to play the game well, but numerous times I have went under a turret to destroy it, and it auto locks to minions or champions instead, even after locking on the turret. This is something you can do with the precise controls of PC league, but cannot do here.
I have accidentally used abilities, which is less important.
It‚Äôs also really hard to dodge skill shots. The skills stay the same in PC and in rift, but the drag of the thumb makes it much harder to dodge than the simple click.

If you want the game to test out instead of PC, don‚Äôt get rift. If you simply wanna play League on a phone, I recommend it.

It‚Äôs a great game I really like playing the game but the biggest problem with it is that every time the match is about to start my game ends up crashing and I have to load up the game again, and after that I have to sign in again and when I do It kept on saying error with the sign in and I had to do this 7 times before it worked and after that, I played the match finished it and ended up getting a temporarily ban because of the game crashing and the errors, now I have to wait 2 hours now, please fix this it‚Äôs been going on since the 2.2 patch.
review_title: It‚Äôs a great game but a huge problem

Please help me change my servers from NA to the Japanese server so I can play I don‚Äôt have anything negative to say about the game at all it‚Äôs amazing and I have such an awesome time playing it but now it won‚Äôt even let me login please help developers ü•∫ü•∫your boy boi just wanna play some rank dawg with out lagging

It‚Äôs ok but it‚Äôs lacking a lot of things like items and the ability to rune like in the pc game plus if your signing in with the same riot account as your pc account why don‚Äôt you gain access to the same things as the pc version like champions? As I don‚Äôt want to take the time to earn/buy all my champions again plus the free champion thing in the begging isn‚Äôt needed they make a changing free roster of champions weekly you should have to earn point to buy champions or buy them with money if you don‚Äôt have the patience to level up and gain points. I sincerely hope this game will one day meet the same expectations as the pc game.

I‚Äôve been playing League of Legends since 2012, I started playing this as an easier way to play matches and still be able to tend to my kids. Granted I have no complaints about the game or the dynamics. I have a huge problem with the matchmaking system and the reporting system both are terrible. I don‚Äôt like playing ranked matches since it‚Äôs littered with trolls who afk or intentionally feed. Now, I‚Äôm not one who really cares but since majority of the time I‚Äôm getting trolled in ranked matches I don‚Äôt even like playing this game much because of it.

Title says it all, random intervals of a lot of team fights just send my MS straight to 999 with no explanation on why it went that high. It isn‚Äôt my device either since any other app/ game that I have doesn‚Äôt have this problem. This has happened about 15 to 25 times in my games, and I‚Äôve played about a weeks worth. How I know it isn‚Äôt my device is I‚Äôve played it on others, with the same issue. It‚Äôs also not my internet either, since I wouldn‚Äôt be able to play other bigger games (higher gb type big). I‚Äôm only giving a 1 star because I have done everything to try and fix the issue thinking its my end, but with no fix of the 999 MS issue I‚Äôve been having for the amount of time I played.

I‚Äôve played a fair amount of PC LOL (couple thousand games) and I can honestly say that even though it‚Äôs not as ‚Äúgood of a game‚Äù as PC, it‚Äôs more fun. Yeah I know, I know reaction time and controls, but I‚Äôm pretty sure the people complaining are just bad at this version. In some scenarios, I find myself playing better on mobile than PC due to the streamlined feel and simplicity of the controls. Mobile just is so accessible, clean, and fun. Riot came through big on this and revived my love for soul of League.

Very addicting, smooth running and team fights really matter now, controls are a little harder on certain champions but you get used to it. F2P wise the rewards earn a lot slower, but for $10 you can get a reward every time you level up. I have 23 champions, 3 free skins and have been playing for three weeks so it takes awhile. You still need skill to win matches or at least a good team but just wish they were more f2p friendly.
review_title: Great game not that F2P friendly

review: Possibly the best mobile moba, by design at least. The controls and UI are smooth and are easy to learn and allow for complex use of your skills once your used to it. The problem are with the constant disconnection and the game adding bots in place, cause the enemy team to be fed. After your able to reconnect you get penalized which is fine, I guess they can‚Äôt tell what happens since there is not bug report option or an option to send the game logs. But your team also suffer for having to play with a bot. Awful system and bots should be restricted to custom games a vs Ai games.

The gameplay of this is really good. The only problem (and I can‚Äôt find another way to word this without sounding rude) is the players. Next to no one knows how League works it seems in this. No one stays in their lane. Even with everyone scrambled in lanes there‚Äôs never someone top. You constantly get dived even if you have two thirds of your health. I‚Äôm sure this will improve in the future, but for right now it‚Äôs just really annoying. Besides all that the game is great. Overall I really do like it. I think more franchises should bring their games to mobile like this.

Honestly I‚Äôve been playing LoL since 2014, and I‚Äôm super stoked that I can now bring that game with me where ever I go. The only issue I have and it happens almost every game is not understanding what your teammates are typing. Mind you most of it is just toxic things, but I‚Äôm starting to feel like the NA servers are flooded with non English speaking players. I would 100% change this review to a 5 star if I could understand what people are saying in the in game chat. That‚Äôs really my only issue, outside of that no complaints as of right now.

This is simply perfect I‚Äôm master and I play league for years this is only game keep me for this many years besides Pok√©mon and even you guys have way more hours than Pok√©mon I have minimum 6000h of this game on computer and here together 
Stoped playing on computer because lack of time and sometimes hard to have computer but on the phone is just perfect this is literally computer game on phone not like others hella mistakes this is master piece. (Bring back chat all)

Every game is unbelievably toxic. If you lose lane (especially jungle), you get mercilessly flamed. Every. Single. Game. Riot employees completely ignore chat reports containing racism and homophobia as well as reports of obviously griefing players. But, they make sure to ban and restrict players for going AFK a single game (potentially due to factors they cannot control) or accidentally forgetting to accept a match a single time (the timer goes by quickly, so accepting a match can be quite difficult). People also flame you in different languages, so Google Translate is a required app for this game (please fix the regions). Champs are unbalanced. Matchmaking is unbalanced. Also, Riot please don't tell me to send a support ticket; that system is completely useless and pointless.

Same great game for the most part. I like the healing plants and how they replace potions. Less convenient methods of typing means less trolls and griefers oddly enough. 

My main issue with the game is I‚Äôm finding it extremely difficult to aim ranged abilities. It‚Äôs very embarassing playing Jhin and the R opens in the wrong direction when normally I play him well on pc. I also can‚Äôt land a Lux R to save my life, even though I normally land them 75+% of the time on pc. Target switching is difficult as well for someone with big stubby fingers like me. I also hope some of my mains become available soon, like Morgana, Sejuani, Sett, and Tahm Kench.

This game would be solid, but every few games the server becomes unplayable with up to 15 seconds input lag. This would be manageable, I don‚Äôt mind leaving a bad server, but then I get banned for quitting out of an obviously unplayable server? Either fix your trash servers or be a lil less strict on the bans while you accept that your servers are trash. Otherwise, when it actually works which is like 80% of games, it‚Äôs a fun and loyal mobile take on an old PC game I used to play. Did I mention that despite the option to log in with my original Riot Games account, NONE of the dozens of characters I‚Äôve gruelingly unlocked OR the aesthetic skins that I‚Äôve paid real money for on the PC version carry over.
review_title: Leaving unplayable servers incurs a ban

review:
As much as I love league of legends and enjoy playing the mobile version, the skill gap between new players and veterans are huge and when I play a game I would sometimes get griefed because I would be the only one that understands the game in my team as they are being farmed, this is not the only issue, ranked is even worse and people are messing each other over champion selection.

Once again good game but there needs to be a restriction or a better implementation of separation of good and bad players like a credit system.
review_title: Great game but for pc players it can be frustrating

review:
I been waiting for this game so long. Even now i play pc version. I can‚Äôt login to this game because it is still not available for mh region. But after waiting for months I decided to check it with vpn. Compare to pc version its so bad. But i thought it will reach nearly mobile legend‚Äôs level because league of legends is top tier in pc. But its bad than mobile legend. 

When will this game get globally out. Could you check difference between pc one and try to improve this game. It seems like heroes are unbalanced and too easy to earn gold. As a jungle i played twice and gold rate is too high that i become unstoppable effortless. Please balance heroes and make it hard like pc.
review_title: Unbalanced heroes and too easy to get gold.
developerResponse: {'id': 27615389, 'body': "Hi maneke mama,\n\nThat sounds like something we might be able to help you with! Send us a ticket at https://support-wildrift.riotgames.com/ and we'll try to get you back on track.", 'modified': '2022-01-24T04:38:16Z'}

review: The game is optimized to perfection with 60 frames looking really good just the q times are never reliable with comp Qs running minutes. It breaks the champions on you slowly and it is very new player friendly. The tutorial is a little long and I wish there wasn‚Äôt a mandatory easy bots game but other than that the HUD is smooth and doesn‚Äôt crowd the screen. The quality of translations to different languages are very good as to be expected and the pace of the game brings great engagement.

I‚Äôve been playing league on and off for about 8 years. This is amazing because it‚Äôs like going back in time to play the old league before the support items and everything. The mechanics of each character are smooth and on point. I cannot wait to see more happen with this game and I am excited to be able to watch it grow. Thank you riot! Thank you everyone who helped make league on mobile because ethos is great.

Having league on mobile was gonna happen eventually. Which has turned out great. Since league can now work on a phone, then why not put the game on the Switch? I bet putting this on the Nintendo switch would bring more people to play. Especially with the amount of people who use the switch. Not having Wild Rift on the switch seems like a lost opportunity. Either way fun way to play league on the go. üëç

What is this company doing? How is it possible that you make all these ridiculous and pointless modifications when you don‚Äôt even care about the player‚Äôs experience. How can you allow these people who went AFK and replace them with a bot and expect the team to do just as well? You might as well not let that AFK player do anything at all. And why is the remake option only available when someone AFKs after 10 minutes. Obviously the team WILL lose and those AFK people would go off scot-free. This is not a players problem, this is an INTERNAL problem. Do better.

After playing this for awhile now I don‚Äôt want to play PC version anymore. Everything is better thsn the pc league. Better graphic, no big balance issue, and no need to use a lot of time to get newly released champs. The main reason for not playing pc league is that nowadays every champs are able to delete all the components in 1-5 seconds. But here is different! Tanks are tanky, adcs are menace but hard to survive. Every champs are fitted into its role. Not everyone is assassins.

The game is very good overall, but the biggest problem is the number of bots there are in the game. It honestly irritates me on how im losing, because of how many bots be on my time. I can barely win, because of how many bots there are in the game. Even if there is just ONE bot, it creates a whole downfall for the team. We lose just because we don‚Äôt actually have a player, who‚Äôs willing to fight. They just walk around and do nothing, getting themselves killed while feeding the other team. If you could somehow fix this, please do. Because this makes me very unhappy with the game.

We all love and hate Riot. If you‚Äôre in this game you know all their pros and cons. All that aside, you would think they would want to make a good game after all their data, trials and errors. Well they don‚Äôt. 

You are telling me that a billion dollar company can‚Äôt invest in their servers and improve game experience? I‚Äôm not talking about graphics, toxicity, or even quality of animation. 

I‚Äôm talking about every GODMAN time you play your ping spikes and that ends up costing you time since it‚Äôs a guaranteed loss because you have to reset. My phone is a new generation iphone, it runs at it should, I can only imagine what other players with lesser phones experience. 

Put your money where your mouth is, and make something right for once. Stop sabotaging people‚Äôs games because you don‚Äôt and wont fix your connectivity issues. 

With all the gaming competition out there (mobile,pc,console) I hope that one day a good company wants to better themselves and bring a great gaming experience. 

I hope y‚Äôall go bankrupt
review_title: Billion dollar company launches a faulty mobile game to make money

review: The match making in this game is a disgusting joke. I‚Äôve played hard and been promoted atleast 7-8 times in a row only to then be matched with players  in my promo‚Äôs or gold rank that have no clue what‚Äôs going, first time picking a champ, literally don‚Äôt understand the concepts of the game. I can‚Äôt understand how ?? How are these people in my games ?? I could understand one or two games but every single time so far... I get demoted because my team is just to low skilled it makes no sense. I‚Äôve submitted a ticket and they say they have no control but this is crazy... I‚Äôm getting seriously frustrated bot being able to progress becuase I get matched with an army of tards...  BTW.. I easily reach masters in AOV and mythic in MLBB but somehow the wall of tards in WILDRIFT is too strong.

This game is as good as the original! I found myself playing this a lot, But I have a complaint, sometimes when I try join a match it tells me there is a problem with connecting to servers. I usually have full bars so I don‚Äôt know don't know how thats a problem. I then log back into my account only to be kicked out again forcing me to abandon my teammates and making me restart my game. This only occurs after both teams select their characters while I'm loading into the game. Other than that great game looking forward to Yuumi and Yorik. :)
review_title: As good as the original! but...

review: So I want to start off by saying that league of legends on pc is by far my favorite game in the world and always will be and I love wild rift too. But the thing I don‚Äôt like is how little items there are compared to league of legends and also I really don‚Äôt like the mirrored map and o be fair they did add something that tells you which lane is which but it still gets a bit annoying when moving to objectives and other lanes but besides that GREAT JOB!
review_title: Great game but some issues I have with it

review: I have been anxiously awaiting the release of Wild Rift for Mobile in NA. Now that it is finally here and having played it a couple of days now I can confirm it truly delivers. As a former League PC player this game really brings the feel of League right to your smartphone. I am looking forward to seeing how this app develops and how ranked plays out. It also seems much more user friendly than when I used to play, including free champions both random and of your choosing, skins, and emotes right out of the gate.
review_title: The Best MOBA Comes to Mobile

review:
This game is very frustrating to play. This champion called Yuumi is has been extremely broken for about half a year now and they have done nothing about it. And she requires the least amount of skill (she literally just latches onto a person and gives them bonus stats, she doesn‚Äôt have to move for the entire game) also Soraka and Lulu are extremely broken as well. 

This games balance is a mess. Depending on your teammates to make smart bans leads to a loss. You have to play at a grandmaster level in order to leave emerald which is extremely unfair. That‚Äôs the best way to describe this game: unfair. Do not play it.

I love league, this version is fun in a slightly different way than the Pc version but still very much enjoyable. However, I don‚Äôt play this daily and I seem to get a chance to play once a week or so (bored at work or whatever) and every single time there is a 30mb update. Like I love the support the game is getting but I haven‚Äôt been able to play because of this! I don‚Äôt have time for a 15 minute update to play a 12 minute match. Get that part together, riot or Apple. Also, mobile valorant soon? Yes? Yes.

I play league of legends (less and less as time goes on) and got this game to mess around when I‚Äôm on the road. It‚Äôs a decent mobile rendition of the game, but I always have issues with updates. I‚Äôve been waiting on it to update for days now, stuck in a loop between telling this app to update without Wi-Fi (seriously, people, unlimited internet plans exist) and waiting a while just to find out it hasn‚Äôt done anything. Not sure if this is an issue with the app, the AppStore (because apple is such a great and flawless company) or how they interact with each. All I know is, when I select an option, I expect that action to be carried out and so far I‚Äôve disappointed several times

Download Mobile Legends instead. The skill gap for new players & seasoned players is atrocious. Hero‚Äôs skills and ultimate are boring and can literally take a minute to come back. Nevertheless you get put in matches against full squads/ highly experienced players while soloing. The seasoned players in party‚Äôs will always wipe the floor with u and randoms.  The menu is a catastrophic waste land to navigate. Why did you choose symbols over words for a menu? You‚Äôre alienating your new player base. This is why the app isn‚Äôt being downloaded as much as mobile legends. Great graphics & hero‚Äôs though, take more time to fine tune the skills and ultimates. Maybe borrow some menu/class setup elements from your competitor.

Now I take it with me on the go!! :) great app and honestly prefer the mobile over pc now. The only thing I don‚Äôt like that followed over was some toxicity of players‚Ä¶ I wasn‚Äôt sure where to find report button for negative players. But the penalty system on PC was pretty good, hope this follows over as well. Also I will check settings to make sure but to size out more so you can see more of the map.
review_title: Used to play pc then had no time, then came the app!

review: I don‚Äôt understand how this was awarded iPhone game of the year when I have the biggest iPhone made and I can‚Äôt read any of the text on the screen without using the Accessibility thing that lets you double-tap with three fingers to zoom in (and having to do that is a huge inconvenience and impractical in an actual game where time is critical). Much more to say but voice transcription doesn‚Äôt work in the App Store (at least not now) and typing is too slow and laborious, so‚Ä¶good luck with this game! Hope you brought a microscope or you won‚Äôt be able to play!

negative playerbase, 
players with no game sense are getting into games with decent players trying to have fun.
no one has a clue how to buy what items and when, there is no item tutorial, people play like bots and will buy MR despite playing against a full AD team.
they wont buy boots till after they have 2 other items and are way behind
they walk into melee/bruiser range as a ranged/squishy
they walk into turrets,
they engage in 1v3 fights despite team pinging retreat.
if i am pinned or caught they will engage instead of saving themselves or defending
everyone always teamfights and no one cares about objectives.
please add a deathmatch mode,
or arena mode
or something, to help keep certain crowds among different ques.
or possibly add a smaller 2v2 or 3v3 option.
or possibly add a larger 10x10 option.
having objectives is nice but i think having a capture the flag, 
or king of the hill
would help with some of the playerbase.
if there was an endless mode similar to those .io type games i bet it would be super popular,

Overall the game is ahead of its time when it comes to the Mobil platform.. however I started playing LoL at the beginning of season 3 and I now have the same complaint from then for wild rift. Blind pick is incredibly annoying to play, give us normal draft so I don‚Äôt have to see a mirror match of Master Yi(with a cat attached) in the jungle 8 out of 10 games. It‚Äôs toxic enough that I‚Äôve even restricted myself to only playing ARAM due to non-stop flavor of the month spams seen in blind. I can‚Äôt ask for more than a pick/ ban phase for normal gameplay without the sweats of Ranked.
review_title: Will bump to 5 for normal draft

review:
Only writing this review since i can‚Äôt reply to that review made by ‚ÄúJftech01‚Äù. The dude said this was a battle royale and the game was pay to win in certain aspects, both of which are completely false because if he had any prior experience like league of legends, which the game is based off of, he‚Äôs know it isn‚Äôt pay to win just to look pretty. Get this goofy ahh mf outta here üóø. 

As for the game, it‚Äôs exactly what you expect, a bite-sizes league of legends with easier mechanics and leas toxicity.

The game keep telling me to reconnect to match and say fail to reconnect after and my wifi or 5G is still run perfectly normal for all other apps then after a while it say the previous match is already end and the same thing happen in the next match before loading to the game. Been waiting for this game to release but all I can see is disappointment. Addition, the game run smoothly with no reconnect problem now but however a new problem arise where the server was not stable when you play the game it keep getting higher ping spike even though the WiFi was running fine which impact on the casting of the ability which make the game horrible.
developerResponse: {'id': 25188609, 'body': "Hi Shahid,\n\nNothing can ruin a game like connection issues, and we'd like to help. Please submit a ticket on https://support-wildrift.riotgames.com/ and we'll see if we can figure this one out.", 'modified': '2021-09-19T10:29:23Z'}

review:
This game is amazing. A fun mobile game that IS LoL on the phone. I love league and this game is one of my favorites to play when I am not home or don‚Äôt have the time to play on my PC. I am giving it 3/5 because of one major concern I have.

My one and ONLY complaint is bot accounts playing in ranked lobbies and there never being something done about it. Around 1/10 games I will have an OBVIOUS bot account assigned to a role on my team, and they play the same if not worse as the bots for someone going AFK. This needs to be addressed and honestly reports taken seriously to fix the health of this game.

Beautiful game unfortunate riot is late to the mobile scene. Not enough players matchmaking is pretty bad and it‚Äôs hard to b/c the better you get you match with some really low elo players who don‚Äôt know what to do. I really dislike that in matchmaking in general, they should just keep ppl crappy players together and make them keep losing so that they can setup game matches with good players vs good players. Crappy players can‚Äôt rank high enough b/c if they match with good players they‚Äôll get smashed.   That way you can keep most of them out of diamond. Don‚Äôt match emerald with diamond plz.

I love this game and love playing it but when I went to log into my account I found that I had to start everything over with no reason as to why. I‚Äôve tried to find out why and ways to fix it but with no luck. All the money I‚Äôve spent in it is no for nothing and I can‚Äôt even contact customer support or submit a ticket without creating a riot account and since I log in the wolf rift with apple I‚Äôm out of luck.

Matchmaking is rigged. It intentionally puts you on teams so you lose, regardless of your personal k/d, putting people with historically low k/ds on your team. You should never support a game like that. Riot Games is pathetic. One out of five stars. Update: I have not discovered that, in addition, if you can‚Äôt play the champion you want and decide to quit out to try again, it turns out the game actually FORCES you into the game against your will, with a random champion, depriving other teammates of a player. Even if the game has been COMPLETELY CLOSED. THEN, it actually BANS you from matchmaking because you didn‚Äôt play the game it tried to force you into. I‚Äôm almost speechless. Would never recommend this horrible game.
developerResponse: {'id': 29206446, 'body': 'Reach out to us with a ticket at https://support-legendsofruneterra.riotgames.com/ and we can figure out what happened!', 'modified': '2022-04-16T15:04:38Z'}

review: Extremely tilted matchmaking. You either sweep the other team or get swept. I can‚Äôt rank up because my team is always awful. Obviously I‚Äôm not perfect, but I‚Äôm getting glorious defeat and SVP nearly every loss which means I‚Äôm doing ok. Give me more consistency in teams please. In addition, when someone goes AFK that loss should be forgiven. So dumb that I rank down because someone else decided to stop playing so we lost. There should also be a way to punish someone for intentionally not playing. They get upset so they run circles back at base to avoid they AFK but they still make you lose. Punishments should be extreme for those to discourage them.

I have been playing PC league for 10 years now. It‚Äôs a great game but I have long periods of time where I lay off and play other games. Always returning to league. Anyways, road tripping I was missing gaming so I decided to try out Wild Rift. For a mobile game it‚Äôs freaking amazing. All the feels of League and same abilities and champions. I absolutely love it. Great job Riot. I don‚Äôt know how long this game was in development but it seems like it must have been awhile. 2 thumbs up!

I like league and the champions, but as usual there is always an imbalance but thats to be expected just saying its not very friendly for new people of course cause it isnt like other mobas for mobile which is fine cause you are still getting the LoL experience which is better in my opinion than having it stamped as league but be different completely from it. Honestly though i just want mundo rework and ill be completely satisfied with the game.

I‚Äôm not through with the tutorial and I doubt I want to complete it. The learning curve is absurdly steep and so far everything I‚Äôve done has been ‚ÄúPress here, tap here, move here‚Äù and, honestly, I‚Äôm not learning anything about game play‚Äîjust where to tap when the voice tells me to tap. That‚Äôs not fun at all.

I‚Äôd much rather just figure things out on my own and have fun doing so than go through the motions of ‚Äúlearning‚Äù without actually learning anything. 

A beautiful game but either too complex to be intuitive or the developers are just incapable of trusting the players to put it together for themselves. About to uninstall because I wanted to play a cool battle game, not ‚ÄúSimon Says.‚Äù
review_title: The Learning Curve is Absurdly Steep
developerResponse: {'id': 26169086, 'body': "Hey there Malazoth, \n\nThat sounds like something we might be able to help you with! Send us a ticket at https://support-wildrift.riotgames.com/ and we'll try to get you back on track.", 'modified': '2021-11-09T12:54:43Z'}

review: Wow. I‚Äôve been playing lol for a looong time, I started only a few weeks after beta, and I have enjoyed every second of it! The gameplay is suuuper addicting and fun, all of the legends you can play as are balanced in different ways (even if some are terrible) the general balancing of power is great! Plus, I just generally love the art style and the way all of the legends are made, along with the NPCs. I mean seriously, great job riot, and thank you so much for making this game.

Please fix matchmaking. I‚Äôm sure people won‚Äôt mind longer que times. Please also ban Map hackers. Those PC version D5 hard stuck Chinese are monopolizing Wild Rift with duo que exploit, map hacking, and win trading. I am a veteran pc version jungle main and I am scarred to do baron or elder when the enemy jungle is in Chinese characters. Please also make a filter to que for English speakers and Spanish speakers. Please also take assisting enemy team and afk more seriously as I usually get around  7 individuals that would just shut off the game on there phones and quit during a day, with many days having more than 10 afks. Please also remove diamond 1 and emerald 4 duo queuing as it has became a shortcut to success.

Less drama, more action, easier to pick up on the go. I start on my stationary IPAD and then switch to my phone and continue on the road, and finish while on the star master at the gym.

All games should convert to Mobile, more people have powerful phones over powerful PCs. Games start instantly, they run smooth and you never have to sit down.

I wish more heroes had been added by now like FiddleSticks, however it‚Äôs worth the wait.

After playing two or three games, I‚Äôll just fail to connect to the match. No matter what I try I can‚Äôt get into the game. I go through champion selection, but upon loading into the game it freezes up and says I can‚Äôt connect. I‚Äôve tried just about everything I can think of to fix this, but the only fix is to wait roughly twenty minutes for the match to actually be over and not have the system try to reconnect me. Other than this issue, love the game.
review_title: Love the game, just experiencing issue

review: Games pacing is much faster than regular pc league which tbh is preferable. Its less tilting since the games go quick. The only thing that is a bad idea is the map being mirrored sometimes. Some games top lane is actually on bottom and it makes zero sense as to why Riot thinks this is a good idea. I get so many games where the support or ADC come to top lane with me and if they speak a different language then they stay there because they dont realize im telling them to leave. Ends up stealing my CS pushing my wave and causing duo lane to be a 2v1. Very bad idea to flip the map some matches for no reason

The one major issue I see thus far is disconnects from matches and not being able to rejoin for up to 5-8 minutes. I don‚Äôt know if anyone else has this issue from time to time. But I do see people after others are loaded at 100% they are stuck at 0%. This is a great port. And the latency is good for the most part. But getting a disconnect means, step away for a few minutes because you aren‚Äôt getting back in.

That said, I only have this happen like, 1/9 games. Which isn‚Äôt too bad. But it could use a fix.

It is fun for the most part but very irritating when you go in a match, as soon as you make it to the loading screen then the game disconnect you even when you got full wifi. Not only that, once you are disconnected in this way, it is impossible and I mean impossible to get back in as you constantly get reconnecting error. The good news is that this doesn‚Äôt seems to get me banned nor does that specific match go in my match history, however it is really irritating to see this bug happening repeatedly and having to sit out for like an hour till it works normally again, please fix this bug quickly.

review: I started playing wild rift with my Japanese account and played it pretty much religiously everyday. Worked perfectly fine and had the app for several months now and was a lot of fun for me since my current computer cannot handle regular LoL. Only to come back today to see that I couldn‚Äôt play anymore because something about IP address and that I would have to switch servers. So I did, needless to say, all my friends, progress, and everything that I bought in the app is gone. I‚Äôm not happy. All the money I spent in the app for champions and skins are gone. I refuse to start from scratch. Sent a ticket, but I‚Äôm doubtful that Riot will be able to recover everything that I lost.

If youre looking for a more objective review this is it. Its got almost all the mechanics and combos youll find in regular league while streamlined into an easy moba package.

 Its feels so much more premium than the rest of its competitors. All of the quality of life changes are there with tons of events and champs added regularly for a breath of fresh air.

The only people giving it one stars are mobile legends fanboys and morons who compare mobile league to pc league.
review_title: Best moba youll find on mobile

review: I love the game don‚Äôt get me wrong but just recently I‚Äôve been having to disconnect from my wifi to play any games. My wifi is working and paid for why do i gotta use my cellular data that‚Äôs not as fast when i can connect to my wifi and play smooth. When i do network test 2/4 are green regional broadband delay says not supported and match server says failed how can i fix this? I‚Äôve reset my modem and it‚Äôs still on

Hey riot I love your games! This new league of legends especially is very fun but it does have a major bug that needs to be fixed. It seems often when I try to connect to a game it will give me a message saying that it failed to connect, then when trying to reconnect it keeps giving me the same failed message. I‚Äôve checked my internet and connection on other apps and it works fine so I know it‚Äôs something with the game. Nun the less I still play but it‚Äôs a little annoying having to have to wait until that game I can‚Äôt reconnect to is over to try and join another game. PLEASE FIX!!!

Besides the horrible match making system which has always been a headache these past couple of seasons. They recently release the crystal rose skins which I had purchased six chest keys. Upon opening it I was granted the crystal rose currency and purchased the crystal rose akali skin with it, which upon I did not receive the skin. I contact the support and they tell me they have no records that I have ever had that currency and claim that I am lying. Why would I come to you guys just to lie to get a skin, sounds like a waste of time. They are refusing to help me and return my money. They robbed me of my money over a stupid bug that‚Äôs the game caused. They basically said I opened 6 chest and got nothing from it‚Ä¶

Absolutely dog crap report system how can anyone have fun in this game when players are deliberately helping enemy team. Report that guy and guess what 10 min ban that you can just log out once you accept. Vainglory will be the GOAT always they at least ban repeated offender for hours to days depending on severity, they would even go as far as ban accounts. However, this steaming pile of hot garbage bans only 10 min that being the maximum? If the report system was harsher the community would be much more discipline. Sadly the game may be dead

Update game is even worse now, fps drops to  single digits even with 7 mbs, optimization down the toilet
review_title: Shiny things that keep all the grime and sludge from being found

review: Every single time I play a game for fun and go afk because I have important stuff to do and I cant play anymore it should not get to the point that I cant play for a couple days 15 minutes should be the limit I think it should have a AI play if you are not active for a minute because the AI that are already in the game feel like real players so I hope that they change this sort of policy but otherwise the gameplay is great engaging and really good and one final recommendation I would recommend making the main menu clearer for newer players

I never played league of legends until I downloaded wild rift and I haven‚Äôt been able to put it down

My only complaint is that since it‚Äôs a mobile game you expect games to be short, something you can play while waiting for your bus to arrive, but when you get into a game you can‚Äôt leave or you‚Äôll get heavily penalized for it, and games can last for 30 minutes. I get that leaving puts your team at a serious disadvantage but there are more important things than video games. I just wish that you weren‚Äôt punished as harshly for having to leave. 

Aside from that, I really love this game, the controls feel great for a mobile game, the characters are fun and unique, and the gameplay is extremely satisfying

Thank you Riot Games for making this awesome game

Terrible matchmaking, they claimed to fix‚Ä¶ last 20 games have seen abysmal matchups. terrible game play now, Lee sin unkillable 1 min into game‚Ä¶ just terrible. Never thought I‚Äôd say this but time to go back to mobile legends Update: 9-3 rest of team 0 kills. We lost 32 to 9. Last 40 games my team is 7 and 33. Wild rift‚Ä¶ good bye update: Tried to give another chance, support‚Ä¶ no response. First game in over a week..:. Team was 11 against 67 kills. I had all 11. Good job wild rift. Another round of terrible matchmaking and game play is getting worse. Emailed support 4 times, zero responses. Ignore their auto response here they have no support

review: I rarely write reviews, if ever, but the developers did an amazing job of making LOL mobile friendly and still feel very similar to the PC version. It‚Äôs not the same game and it‚Äôs not nearly as complex, but the feel and the strategy are there and I can say a lot of the skills I developed from my years for playing LOL transfer over. Any complaints are from people that should just stick to playing on PC. This game is amazing for a phone game.

Just because its mobile riot uses that as an excuse to milk its fans more. Im they delete these reviews too, i always have to come back and let people know! They got millions im revenue and they invest in tournaments to get their viewership up, but hows that make the game better? Thats the riot cycle, they take everyones money and give us new shiny things to keep us distracted from how lazy their dev team is now. This game has been out over 10 years lol and they cant even make a full port for mobile yet, what a joke. Their support is a joke, the whole company is a joke. I feel sad for all the people that work for riot. If they ban you permanently for not even cursing, i coudlnt imagine how they treat their employees

As a long time player of League, have been playing since the first season, I couldn‚Äôt be happier with this version of the game. The quality of life changes made to make this more mobile friendly has reinvigorated my enjoyment of this decade+ old game. To the point that I don‚Äôt see a reason to play the PC version, which now feels outdated, sluggish, and wasteful of my time. Hats off to the Wild Rift team, this game is quite the achievement.

Do not play this game if you have any respect for league of legends

I have teammates in ranked going 0/15 in silver, 20 minute queues, and bad game design. 

You cannot go into a ranked game as a 1-3 stack and expect to win. In real league, you can solo carry but in this game, Timmy is allowed to run it down on his crusty iPad and get no punishment and he is still high in the rank system. You may think, I can just 5 stack to get no Timmys on my team but I tried that on separate days at different time and got 20 MINUTE QUEUES. This game is supposed to be a background chill game but 20 minute queues just to crush a team of cheeto dust finger kids on their moms phone. This game is so unplayable and the game is so boring. Do not play this game

review: Last game that was recorded in match history was 8/23. Since then games no longer ‚Äúcount‚Äù and there is a ‚Äúnetwork error, rewards will be distributed later‚Äù which means games no linger make it possible to collect blue essence to unlock champions. The number of cards used before a match for bonus rewards never goes down because the game doesn‚Äôt count. But if you play aram and use poro energy to reroll it does take it after the match even though nothing else is ever taken. So this glitch will still drain the one resource that gives free rewards even though the match isn‚Äôt recorded but will never give essence that helps to unlock champs. Seems sketchy

Played the desktop version of League Of Legends for YEARS shortly after its launch. Stopped playing a few years ago as I didn‚Äôt have as much free time. Dropped off the PC gaming scene entirely shortly after. AS SOON AS THIS LAUNCHED I was all over it. Smooth, responsive, controls about as well as I‚Äôd expect using touch, fantastic overall. Downsides are few for me: FOV narrow on iPad, skins/champions must be purchased again, not all champions currently present. 100% recommendation from me.

It‚Äôs really frustrating getting 2 shot by a champion when I used all my abilities on them in one go including my super and barely take away 25% of their health. Some champions are just overpowered. Also the game needs to be able to read leaving matches better. After the game has been concluded and a stone is broken or surrendered and I leave during the ending animation or after before I returned to lobby it‚Äôs VERY irritating getting a ban for NOT leaving during match progress.
review_title: Needs tweaking but still a great game

review: This game is really fun I enjoy playing it! But I have a question about the suspension thing. I was in the middle of a match when I had to leave for lunch so when I got back on it gave me the warning thing. I would really like a feature to leave the match without getting the warning because I really like this game I don‚Äôt want to get kicked out. But the other thing is I would like a couple more heroes to play as
review_title: Fun game but on little fix

review: The gameplay is actually pretty fun. I enjoy playing each of the roles, but it takes so long to find a game. It takes roughly 2 mins for casual games, but for rank I waited over 15 mins and still didn‚Äôt find a game. (Also let me just say I‚Äôm not even ranked. So for it to take over 15 mins just to find a game is just crazy to me.) I‚Äôm a competitive person so rank is the game mode that I play mostly for any MOBA type games. I just can‚Äôt wait over 15mins just to find a ranked game especially not for a phone game. Y‚Äôall probably won‚Äôt care, but I‚Äôm not gonna play the game until queue times are fixed.
